Connor Boyd death: Woman found guilty of manslaugher seeks to keep name permanently secret https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/connor-boyd-death-woman-found-guilty-of-manslaugher-seeks-to-keep-name-permanently-secret/4BWOO2P7VVFSPE3G5G3KOVSYYU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/connor-boyd-death-woman-found-guilty-of-manslaugher-seeks-to-keep-name-permanently-secret/4BWOO2P7VVFSPE3G5G3KOVSYYU/ Craig KapitanA jury found the woman guilty this week of causing 18yo Connor Boyd's death. Fri, 03 Nov 2023 04:06:22 +0000 Two 20-year-olds continue to have interim name suppression, despite a High Court jury this week finding them both guilty of manslaughter for the April 2022 death of Connor Boyd. Photo / Dean Purcell
